scripts.e2e:ci: npm run e2e:build && npm run e2e:test -- --cleanup

ios.sim.debug.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/loginExample.xcworkspace -scheme loginExample -configuration Debug -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.sim.debug.name: iPhone 11 Pro

ios.release.build: xcodebuild -workspace ios/loginExample.xcworkspace -configuration release -scheme loginExample -sdk iphonesimulator -derivedDataPath ios/build
ios.release.name: iPhone 11 Pro
